messages.content: I'm kinda worried about the whole process, I'm 60 years old and I don't know where to start with filing for a marriage-based green card, can you help me out? ->-> 1,2

I've been with my partner Kayla for 3 years now, and we're thinking of taking the next step, but I'm not sure how my income of $1,200 monthly will affect the application, can you give me some advice? ->-> 1,2
I live in Parkerbury, Senegal, and my partner Kayla lives in Atlanta, Georgia, will the distance between us be a problem when applying for a green card? ->-> 1,3
My partner Kayla is 58, and I'm wondering if our age will have any impact on the application process, can you tell me what to expect? ->-> 1,2
I'm kinda worried about my parents, Ashley and Richard, who are 83 and 79, living all the way in Dakar, Senegal, how can I make sure they're doing okay from so far away? ->-> 1,4
I've been friends with Tina and Heather since 2010, we met at the Parkerbury community center, and they're 66 and 70, can you help me come up with ideas for their birthdays? ->-> 1,5
My assistant Zoe is really young, only 23, and has been working with me since January 2023, what kind of mentorship can I offer her to help her grow professionally? ->-> 1,6

I'm trying to gather character references for my marriage-based green card application, can I use my friends Tina and Heather, and my assistant Zoe, as references, or should I ask someone else? ->-> 1,5

I want to confirm if I qualify for a marriage-based green card by April 10, 2024, can you help me with that eligibility assessment? ->-> 1,8

I started reading the USCIS guide published in January 2024 on spousal immigration, but I'm not sure I understand everything, can you help me with some parts ->-> 1,12

My application is for a marriage-based green card, and I want to make sure I've got all the right documents, like my marriage certificate, which I'm trying to get from Atlanta City Hall, but I'm not sure what other documents I need ->-> 1,10

I'm sorta stressed about the whole process, especially since I have to submit everything by May 1, 2024, can you walk me through the steps I need to take to ensure my application is complete and on time? ->-> 1,18

I'm kinda worried about the climate difference between Parkerbury and Atlanta, you know, since Kayla prefers Atlanta's 75°F summer average over Parkerbury's 85°F, can you help me understand how that might affect our lifestyle? ->-> 1,19
